verses.name: Luke 5:12
verses.text: And it came to pass, when he was in a certain city, behold a man full of leprosy: who seeing Jesus fell on his face, and besought him, saying, Lord, if thou wilt, thou canst make me clean.

verses.name: Luke 5:13
verses.text: And he put forth his hand, and touched him, saying, I will: be thou clean. And immediately the leprosy departed from him.

verses.name: Luke 5:14
verses.text: And he charged him to tell no man: but go, and shew thyself to the priest, and offer for thy cleansing, according as Moses commanded, for a testimony unto them.
